query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles) as total_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '') as no_image_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE featuredImage LIKE '%manus-storage%' OR featuredImage LIKE '%cloudfront%') as s3_articles;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user gudLYJGHFgHSL8P.e6c1a8ce02e0 --database 3FN2mXfNpKxptvfrsuACXq --execute 
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles) as total_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '') as no_image_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE featuredImage LIKE '%manus-storage%' OR featuredImage LIKE '%cloudfront%') as s3_articles;
